newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Swedish Riksbank keeps repo rate flat at 4.10 pct.
newsitem.headline: Swedish Riksbank keeps repo rate flat at 4.10 pct.

text.p: Sweden's central bank, the Riksbank, set its one week key repurchase rate at an unchanged fixed 4.10 percent on Tuesday.
The decision was in line with market expectations.
The central bank's deposit and lending rates stand at 3.75 percent and 5.25 percent, respectively.
The repo rate has been unchanged since December 17, 1996, and many analysts do not expect a change until early 1998 when they see the Riksbank raising the rate.
